Hello,

I hope, this is the right place for my idea of an enhancement:

I would like it very, very much, if there would be a "logical" folder for all "not yet answered emails": I.e. I can see all my Emails, that I should/like to answer (sometimes :-) ).

In worst case it should be identical with income-folder.

Like marking as spam I should be able to set a "done" (or similar) flag and the mail should disappear from this folder (but NOT IN INCOME! - this means my term "logical").

IMHO this would be very efficient in handling even large amounts of emails in a very good and comfortable way.

greetings
zuhans

Reproducible: Always

comments.author: jporterbugs@gmail.com
comments.raw_text:
You can create a saved search that shows all messages that you haven't replied to by right-clicking your inbox and clicking "Search...". Then have it search on the Status of the message (one of the statuses is "Replied"). Finally, click "Save as Search Folder".

You could also create a saved search that filters based on a tag that you set on it, depending on how exactly you want it to work.
